1.0.name: wordpress/the-random-quranic-verse-widget
1.0.description: A widget that displays a random Quranic verse. You can select from 72 different languages for the Quranic verse. It also gives a link at the end of the verse to iknowledge.islamicnature.com where you can read and listen to the rest of the Surah, read the tafsir of the Surah and download the mp3 of the verse from different recitors. Tags: koran, quran, muslim, islam, plugin, verse, widget.
